wikipedia_page.main: Triona Carville is a pop rock singer-songwriter from Northern Ireland, more commonly known by her stage name "Triona". In 2014 she won the Cel Fay award for songwriter of the year and in 2016 she won the Panart's young singer-songwriter of the year.

response: Triona is a shortened form of the given name Catriona.
Well-known people named "Triona" include the following:
*Triona Holden, British artist, writer and presenter
